name: Reaching All Youth Project
description: The RAY Project connects youth with master-level artists in an effort to preserve the tradition of Capoeira. Capoeira is a Brazilian art that combines self-defense, movement, and music. All activities take place at ACSF's Capoeira Arts Center. Classes are combined by student performances, guest artist workshops, and participation in events like SF Carnaval and ACSF's Batizado-a traditional ceremony in which new students are welcomed into the tradition and continuing students graduate in level.
